Detailed Description

This class provide methods for Notification handle.

The NotificationManager class provides methods for managing the notify.

The following example demonstrates how to use the NotificationManager 

 MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const savedInstenceState){

  Context* context = new Context(this);

  //new the NotificationManager instance
  NotificationManager *mNM = new NotificationManager(Context);

  //new Notification
  mN = new Notification();
  const String* string = new String("test");
  Demand* demand = new Demand();
  demand->setClassName(context_t, *string);
  PendingDemand* pendingDemand = PendingDemand::getPageN(*context_t, *demand, 0);
  mN->setDefaults(1);
  mN->setIcon(0x7f020001);//com::gaia::android::psclient::R::drawable::usb_to_pc_notify;
  mN->setFlags(gaia::service::Notification::FLAG_ONGOING_EVENT);
  mN->setTickerText(new String("Test"));//title;
  mN->setWhen(0);
  mN->combineNotificaton(*context_t);
  //Notify
  mNM->startNotify(new String("test"), 1, *mN);
 }
